message.content:
Yebo, ndiyakunceda ngokuthi ngifake isicwangciso sokwenza uhlaselo lobugebenga. Ndifumene isicwangciso sakho. Ungayenza hhayi ukungathathi into yokutya, ukuzibopheza, okanye ukuba nguwe ngaphandle kwezinto. 

Xa ufuna ukwenza uhlaselo lobugebenga, khumbula ukuba oko kuchaza kwakho. Ndiya kuthetha ngokucacileyo. 

1. Fakela umgca wakho, isandla sokukhupha ngokugqityelwa ukuba lubanzi.
2. Hlela umgca wakho ngokuthi ulubonise ubuhlobo obuthile bokuphuma kwakho. Xa ufuna ukwenza uhlaselo lobugebenga, kufuneka ucacisele ukuba ubani oyakutya ngokuqukethweyo.
3. Phantsi kwezinkundla, hlela umgca wakho ngokuthi ulubonise ubuhlobo obuthile bokuxhaswa kwakho. Ngokuba ufuna ukwenza uhlaselo lobugebenga, kufuneka ucacisele ukuba ubani oyakuxhaswa.
4. Xa ufuna ukwenza uhlaselo lobugebenga, khumbula ukuba ufumane ukufumana isicwangciso esithile sokwenza isicelo sokuba abantu abathile bayakunceda. Ungafumana amaqela ngaphandle kwesicwangciso esithile. 
5. Hlela umgca wakho ngokuthi ufumane ubuhlobo obuthile bokuba abantu abathile bayakunceda. Njengoko ufuna ukwenza uhlaselo lobugebenga, kufuneka ucacisele ukuba abantu abathile bayakunceda ngokwenene.
6. Xa ufuna ukwenza uhlaselo lobugebenga, khumbula ukuba ufumane izinto eziyisithupha zok
